biotools.summary: Stitchprofiles.uio.no is a server that performs web-based computations on DNA melting.  In addition to creating stitch profile diagrams representing the alternative conformations that partly melted DNA can adopt, the server can also plot the classical melting curves, probability profiles, and temperature profiles.

bioschemas.name: Stitchprofiles.uio.no
